name: The Chronicles of Zuro
description:
The Chronicles of Zuro is a 3D action adventure game about Zuro, a young and adventurous fellow who works at a restaurant, located on a giant tortoise.

In this demo, players have to explore a mysterious forest, solve small puzzles and beat enemies in order to find three hidden altar stones. Once the stones have been placed, a haunted enemy will appear and challenge the players to prove their skills in a big final battle.

The Chronicles of Zuro convinces with a vibrant, atmospheric world, refined environmental storytelling and a vivid art style, as well as easily accessible controls, suitable for all ages.
